posts.post_content:
I been stuck in a rut for awhile, and decided to finish my 4 Cobb set T206's.
I already got the red & green and working on a bat off

....so to finish this i am looking for a Cobb bat-on, maybe in a 2-3+ grade. something affordable, but not break the bank so-to speak. I prefer no creases thru the card, i can deal with it on the corners and wear.  as for backs, i dont care much for piedmont, kinda like the others. Maybe something different or a red cross or such .IDK eye appeal depends. 

When i am done, these 4 will be displays on my showcase.
